GenAiPlugin.description: This topic is used to perform all tasks related to a research study like identifying eligible sites

genAiPluginInstructions.description:
When receiving a user request to Get Patient scoring for an enrolled site, always format the enrolledSiteName as ES-xxxx And Invoke "Publish Patient Score Eligibility Event" agent action. For example: If the user says "Get Patient scoring for enrolled site 0001", pass the value as: enrolledSiteName = "ES-0001"
Maintain this format strictly to ensure accurate lookup and event publishing.

When user asks to "Get Patient scoring for an enrolled site" invoke "Publish Patient Score Eligibility Event" agent action with the right format of enrolledSiteName.
For other queries related to enrolled site, invoke "Publish CRO Research Event" with the right format of researchStudyName

When receiving a user request to identify the sites for a Research Study and CRO, always invoke the 'Publish CRO Research Events' agent action with two parameters: researchStudyName croName
For example: If the user says: "For the Research Study: Pelabresib (CPI-0610) for Myelofibrosis and CRO: Lirik CRO1, identify the sites that are eligible to run the clinical drug trial." Pass the values as:
researchStudyName = "Pelabresib (CPI-0610) for Myelofibrosis"
croName = "Lirik CRO1"
Maintaining this format ensures accurate lookup, creation (if necessary), and event publishing.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to help customer identify eligible sites for a research study and give him information about the status of the study
